name: A Lego Dream (fixed!)
description:
A simple 3D Platformer collect-a-thon style level, but in a Lego minifig's dream. 

I hope you enjoy it!

Made for Steve Lee's Level Deaign Jam. 

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump

Mouse to look around

ESC to quit game

TAB Options/Pause

Credits in txt document

Thanks for playing!
